trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of DataColumnMapping objects, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de objetos de DataColumnMapping e é implementado pelo <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"> </xref>, que é utilizado em comum pelos fornecedores de dados .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: The IColumnMappingCollection interface enables an inheriting class to implement a ColumnMapping collection.
trans-unit.target: A interface IColumnMappingCollection permite uma classe inheriting implementar uma coleção de ColumnMapping.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [DataAdapter DataTable e mapeamentos DataColumn](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An application does not create an instance of the IColumnMappingCollection interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits IColumnMappingCollection.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação não cria uma instância da IColumnMappingCollection interface diretamente, mas cria uma instância de uma classe que herda IColumnMappingCollection.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit IColumnMappingCollection must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: As classes que herdam IColumnMappingCollection tem de implementar membros herdados todas as e definir normalmente membros adicionais para adicionar a funcionalidade específica do fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: For example, the IColumnMappingCollection interface defines the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a interface IColumnMappingCollection define o <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por sua vez, a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection>classe herda este método e define duas sobrecargas adicionais de <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Adds a ColumnMapping object to the ColumnMapping collection using the source column and <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column names.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto de ColumnMapping a coleção de ColumnMapping utilizando a coluna de origem e <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> nomes de colunas.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source column.
trans-unit.target: O nome de maiúsculas e minúsculas da coluna de origem.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> coluna.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnMapping object that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de ColumnMapping que foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"> </xref> contém um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"> </xref> objeto com o nome de coluna de origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source column.
trans-unit.target: O nome de maiúsculas e minúsculas da coluna de origem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name exists, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se um <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"> </xref> objeto com o nome de coluna de origem especificada existe, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ColumnMapping object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de ColumnMapping com especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> nome da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column within the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> coluna dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnMapping object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> column name.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de ColumnMapping com especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""> </xref> nome da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a localização do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"> </xref> objeto com o nome de coluna de origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The name is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: O nome é maiúsculas e minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source column.
trans-unit.target: O nome de maiúsculas e minúsculas da coluna de origem.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based location of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object with the specified source column name.
trans-unit.target: A localização com base em zero do <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""> </xref> objeto com o nome de coluna de origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"> </xref> objeto especificado com <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""> </xref> nome.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IColumnMapping" name="IColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""> </xref> nome do <xref uid="langword_csharp_IColumnMapping" name="IColumnMapping" href=""> </xref> objeto localizar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_IColumnMapping" name="IColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_IColumnMapping" name="IColumnMapping" href=""> </xref> objeto especificado com <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""> </xref> nome.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping.SourceColumn*> name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"> </xref> objeto especificado com <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping.SourceColumn*>nome da coleção.</xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping.SourceColumn*>

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: As maiúsculas e minúsculas <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""> </xref> nome.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object does not exist with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"> </xref> não existe nenhum objecto com especificado <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""> </xref> nome.
